event_registry_properties.name: title
description
event_registry_properties.item: A problem has been detected in the PCI subsystem.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: This fault requires user and/or service interaction and currently does not have an automated response agent.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: Possible loss of devices that may be attached to the system via this device/bus and/or system downtime.
event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Ensure that the latest drivers and patches are installed, schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected device if necessary, or contact Sun for support.
